title: Bounce Backs + Waiver Wire Tilt, King of Texas - Fantasy Football Podcast for 9/15
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason answer a number of important questions as we enter Week 2! Plus, big time waiver tilt on the air, and a Week 2 bounce back edition of Buy or Sell. Finally, a Thursday Night Football preview of the Giants vs Washington. Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast -- Fantasy Football Podcast for September 15th, 2021
  
 (08:45) - Buy or Sell (Bounce Backs Edition)
 (15:40) - NFL News
 (19:10) - Mailbag
 (21:40) - Saquon Barkley or Elijah Mitchell
 (26:15) - Player Drop Strategy
 (29:15) - Michael Pittman Jr. - Stash or Trash?
 (33:35) - Robert Woods
 (36:40) - Michael Thomas
 (38:50) - More league trading!
 (42:50) - Ryan Tannehill
 (44:45) - Dolphins offense
 (45:40) - Will Fuller V
 (47:35) - Thursday Night Breakdown - Giants at Washington
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
